tasks.label: Run Image Viewer with Debug Logging
tasks.command: Remove-Item debug.log -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; & { uv run python -m image_viewer --log-level debug 2>&1 } | ForEach-Object { Write-Host $_; Add-Content -Path debug.log -Value $_ }
tasks.detail: PowerShell task — prints normal-colour console output using Write-Host and appends to debug.log; not portable to Bash/CMD (use '2>&1 | tee debug.log' there).

tasks.label: Run Image Viewer (Thumb LRU Cache Logs Only)
tasks.command: Remove-Item debug.log -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $env:IMAGE_VIEWER_LOG_LEVEL='debug'; $env:IMAGE_VIEWER_LOG_CATS='thumb_cache'; & { uv run python -m image_viewer --log-level debug 2>&1 } | Where-Object { $_ -match 'thumb_lru' } | ForEach-Object { Write-Host $_; Add-Content -Path debug.log -Value $_ }
tasks.detail: PowerShell task — filters to only thumb_lru lines and writes exactly the same output to both console and debug.log.
